name: messages-app
description: A simple full-stack real-time chat app using React, TypeScript, Express, and Socket.IO. Features dynamic usernames and live messaging. Persistence coming soon.

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start --prefix backend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
